django-shapes changelog
-----------------------


Version 0.2.0, February 11th, 2010:
-----------------------------------

 Re-wrote the ShpResponder, adding default usage of python-ogr bindings rather
 than usage of GeoDjango's ctypes bindings to workaround potential segfault in 
 OGR when using Python 2.6.
 
 Thanks to Jared Kibele for the initial patch.


Version 0.1.0, October 1st 2009:
--------------------------------

 First packaged release from r27
